00001 #ifdef FASTDELEGATE_ALLOW_FUNCTION_TYPE_SYNTAX
00002 
00003 // Declare Delegate as a class template.  It will be specialized
00004 // later for all number of arguments.
00005 template <typename Signature>
00006 class Delegate;
00007 
00008 //N=0
00009 // Specialization to allow use of
00010 // Delegate< R (  ) >
00011 // instead of 
00012 // Delegate0 < R >
00013 template<typename R>
00014 class Delegate< R (  ) >
00015         // Inherit from Delegate0 so that it can be treated just like a Delegate0
00016         : public Delegate0 < R >
00017 {
00018 public:
00019         // Make using the base type a bit easier via typedef.
00020         typedef Delegate0 < R > BaseType;
00021 
00022         // Allow users access to the specific type of this delegate.
00023         typedef Delegate SelfType;
00024 
00025         // Mimic the base class constructors.
00026         Delegate() : BaseType() { }
00027 
00028         template < class X, class Y >
00029         Delegate(Y * pthis, 
00030                 R (X::* function_to_bind)(  ))
00031                 : BaseType(pthis, function_to_bind)  { }
00032 
00033         template < class X, class Y >
00034         Delegate(const Y *pthis,
00035                 R (X::* function_to_bind)(  ) const)
00036                 : BaseType(pthis, function_to_bind)
00037         {  }
00038 
00039         Delegate(R (*function_to_bind)(  ))
00040                 : BaseType(function_to_bind)  { }
00041         void operator = (const BaseType &x)  {    
00042                 *static_cast<BaseType*>(this) = x; }
00043 };
00044 
00045 //N=1
00046 // Specialization to allow use of
00047 // Delegate< R ( Param1 ) >
00048 // instead of 
00049 // Delegate1 < Param1, R >
00050 template<typename R, class Param1>
00051 class Delegate< R ( Param1 ) >
